titles.title: Dokuhaku Suru Universal Yoko Mercator Egg Man
Monologues of Universal Transverse Mercator
独白するユニバーサル横メルカトル Egg Man

anime.description: * Based on the award-winning Dokuhaku Suru Universal Yoko Mercator mystery novel by http://anidb.net/cr21992 [Hirayama Yumeaki]. A psychopathic killer known as Egg Man has been caught, incarcerated and is awaiting his death sentence. Karen, a beautiful and brave police woman, is assigned to the "Egg Man" case to find the whereabouts of a missing dead body. Egg Man meets his cellmate, Prisoner 205. Who is Prisoner 205? Is Prisoner 205 another in-mate awaiting his death sentence as well or an android utilized by the police to collect information about him and his knowledge of the corpse? Who is really manipulating whom? Source: ANN

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
